main_topic.author: OminousDude
main_topic.title: Why not make a sabotage agent?
main_topic.content: In this competition, the pair of Questinior and Answerer get better scores if they collaborate and don't lie. However what if someone made a purposefully deceiving agent for making other agents's scores worse? Is this illegal or am I missing something? Thank you for considering my question!

comments.author: Chris Deotte
comments.content: A Questioner is paired with an Answerer that has similar LB score. A sabotage agent would eventually have a bad low LB score. So a sabotage agent eventually will only get paired with teams on the bottom of the LB. Therefore a sabotage agent should not affect the important top of the LB.
